attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
World hunger is a major world problem, with many millions of people dying through starvation every year. it's a problem that needs tackling- and fast.

We would like your support in helping the governments of hunger-stricken countries like Sudan, Eritrea and the Democratic Republic of Congo to feed the millions of people starving- in these three countries alone, over 65% of all of their population suffers from malnutrition.

We value your support. Thankyou.
